div.p: Here you will find a virtual space to open up collaboration among 84000 translators, editors, and staff, access to resources and guides for how to use them, and a channel for the exchange of feedback. The Translation Community is a project in process, so your contribution is more than welcome as we expand and develop.
Welcome! Please take a look around and tell us what you think.
